# Bunker-Stats vs NumPy Benchmark Summary (500k elements, 10 repeats)

## Overall comparison (where NumPy baseline exists)

- Total functions with NumPy baseline: 12
- Wins: 8
- Ties: 0
- Losss: 4

Median CV (bunker-stats): 0.2302700131814346
Median CV (NumPy): 0.1625360777951529
